item.title: A Atenção Alheia Ajudará
item.description: Devo observar que a atenção alheia, especialmente a não bem-vinda às vezes, ao invés de atrapalhar me ajudará.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Sig Tuas Idéias
item.description: Acumule talidade. Não hesite em seguir tuas idéias loucas. Tempo conta. A prática é essa.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Mudança é Estabilidade
item.description: “Mudança é estabilidade e estabilidade muda.” Portanto, não te preocupas em a vitória agora; podes compreendê-la, ou não. Mas a ação atual é apenas mais um elo na corrente eterna. Tenha consciência da Dança dos Espíritos.

Lama Tsering diz que devemos dar-lhes o Dharma de aviãozinho, como se faz com uma criança.

Dai tu pensa, e fala assim: gatinha, é assim, o ser humano tem diversas personalidades, ele é diversas pessoas e …

item.title: Ó Iniciado
item.description:
Ó iniciado, não deixa que tua falta de desenvolvimento se transforme em cegueira.

Lembra, ó iniciado nos mistérios ancestrais, da visão do mestre iluminado e da sua humildade e amor.

Pisa firme, rachando o véu da ilusão atinge Samadhi. Te lembra do teus irmãos mais novos, pois é assim que …
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Ring Don't Pass and the Apt
item.description:
Some minds are incapable of doing certain movements; If I require certain people to do certain movements, I can assure that only the apt will pass from that “ring don't pass.”

Eg.: Many Women cannot be jealous on one Man.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Gesturing and Intercommunication
item.description: In the reality, in the intercommunication between people (eg., strange people you meet on street) is only symbolic. The main action is in the consciousness trying to understand the meaning of those symbolic acts and gestures. No need to rush over other people when meeting then. Just get in touch …

item.title: The benefit of Truth
item.description: The Benefit of Truth is a concept of mine of the benefit which men that live by Truth have over the other men, to name it, the liar, and the hypocrite.

item.title: The Energy Flow
item.description: The sex energy should be guided by the body and maybe commanded by intelligence; not by intelligence alone; a man should be freed from the mind this way.

item.description: The reality is as delicious as my will. My will is as delicious as the reality.

item.description:
I have crossed to the other margin. After many time of practice, the teaching of masters, except for the Supreme Master of Mine have no more meaning to me.

The objective has been attained. I have no more flutuations.

I believe this is the begin of the Path. But I …

item.title: What I Will Become
item.description: I don't want some of them prefer me, while other don't. I am becoming likely to all of them. Those which I feel interested.

item.title: There is No Grace Without Spirituality
item.description: There is no Grace without spirituality; don't try to explain your joke too much. No need for this. Tell it in the right field.

item.title: Interestellar (and This RPG)
item.description:
On this thursday or friday this boy could remember os his trans-stellar lineage.

Got himself on bed having a nightmare and calling for his stellar family. Woke up. Still lying down and doing his meditation practice as usual, he flied in his fertile imaginatin, and remembered of his origins.

item.title: “Know thyself”
item.description:
The saying that a man who knowns himself knows the universe is a true saying.

There is the “Circle of the Infinite Unviverse,” and it is contained in him.

item.title: A View on Magick Games
item.description: At the beginning you would like to play magic games so you would have some advantages over other men. It is like that, at the end of the path, you realized that this was really granted to you, but you was also prepared for this responsabiility.

item.description:

Also, the culture of drinking the Chimarrão (traditional beverage made of yerba mate)

It seems to me very significant to my life and human experience having arrived and lived here for …

item.title: Let's Ponder
item.description:
I was on my console when I saw this fortune:

A woman forgives the audacity of which her beauty has prompted us to be guilty.
          -- LeSage

Maybe we can ponder about this issue. :)

item.title: free breezes and universes
item.description:
All the breezes that need physical or concrete objects like musical videoclips are subject to the limitations of any other universes. I mean, they are universes like any other, their metareality only change to "high" or "low" by the characteristic of karma, merit or lack of merit.

So, I say …
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: The Wise and the Fool
item.description: 'Wise' is a precise characteristic: a man is it or he isn't. The fool never changes.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Philosophy and agendas
item.description:
Me, as a philosopher, cannot have any compromise with any agenda. As agendas are forms of viewing the life from a perspective, and a philosopher should look into the "human" life from a free "perspective".

Nothing ever was so funny as tagging this post.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Choice
item.description:
“Choice” is potential. Choice x or choice y is putting that potential at an end.

A man studies a musical instrument for a while, then he says: “Ok, now, I am a musician.” But if now he is a musician what was he before? nothing? void? He was something, because …
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Time is A Being
item.description: Time is vibration, time is a dimension. «"Now" is not time for classical, it is for Folk». Time changes and it is a vibration: different vibrations mark different time-marks. Man's vision (or perception, contemplation) on time should be corrected.
item.dc:creator: Iacchus Mercurius

item.title: Opening the labs
item.description:
Here we are. This is our very first post. This is not intended to be a presentational blog, but instead to contain my personal ideas and experiments on various subjects.

formatting sources with vim's gq}

item.title: Technology as War Tools
item.description: It seems to me that tecnology and philosophy should be treated as war tools. Be it for attack, be it for defense, but when you bring them closer while being out of war, then you stain what is naturally perfect and immaculate.

item.title: What is a man
item.description: If you dissaprove the feminist agenda and have some specific point-of-view on these issues, then you should know how to categorize the differences between what is a men and what is a woman.
